name: Top Down Shooter - Series Tutorial
description:
This is the completed version of the game that is found on my tutorial channel https://www.youtube.com/gamemakercasts

On that channel you can find the full series on making the game that you are able to play. If you want access to the complete source there are two ways to get it. The first way is to pay the minimum suggested amount found on this page, or you can become a Patreon supporter at the $5 tier level (https://www.patreon.com/gamemakercasts).
